feed.title: Ruublog
feed.subtitle: This is a blog about my web development progress. Blog was generated with the help of saberjs.

entry.title: My first post
entry.summary: My first post on my blog, I'm still trying to figure out most of the settings for saberjs, but it seems to me that this is a very quick and easy way to make a blog such as this possible. Hopefully you can expect daily updates on my life and web development progress.
entry.content: My first post on my blog, I'm still trying to figure out most of the settings for saberjs, but it seems to me that this is a very quick and easy way to make a blog such as this possible. Hopefully you can expect daily updates on my life and web development progress.
